title: jmri-json-hello-server-message
description: Data portion of message from JMRI to client for type "hello"

json.description: JSON protocol version in major.minor.patch form; provides more detail than "version", but cannot be used to set preferred version

version.description: JSON protocol version in the API form

heartbeat.description: Frequency, in milliseconds, in which the JSON client must send a message to maintain a connection

activeProfile.description: The name of the current profile or null if no profile is active
